result.title: ELVITEN demonstration methodology and baseline scenarios
result.description: This deliverable will be the output of T2.1 and T2.2 and will present the methodology to collect data and calculate the KPIs, the methodology to involve users and the questionnaires to be administered.It will also present the baseline situation for each of the Demonstration Cities, including baseline values of the agreed KPIs, to be compared with the ELVITEN findings after the demonstrations.
